Activity: Log in, check emails, and review feedback from @PROD-1 on the Game Design Document draft.

Meeting with @CART-1 to discuss concept art for the narrative hook. Provide guidance on visual style, character design, and environmental elements. Give them a rough storyboard to better understand the context.
Revise the Game Design Document based on feedback from @PROD-1. Address all concerns and incorporate suggestions. Focus on clarity, conciseness, and completeness.
Prepare a presentation summarizing the Game Design Document for the entire team. Highlight key features, mechanics, and narrative elements. Emphasize the vision and direction of the game.
Practice the presentation. Anticipate potential questions and prepare thoughtful answers. Refine the presentation based on practice runs.
Send out a meeting invitation to the entire team for tomorrow's presentation. Subject: Game Design Document Presentation - Team Meeting. Mention the purpose of the meeting.
